doc:
Laura Solon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laura_Solon 0 Laura Madalene Solon (born April 1979) is an English screenwriter, comedian, actress, and winner of the 2005 Perrier Comedy Award. She was the second woman to win as a solo performer, after Jenny Eclair in 1995. Laura_Madalene_Solon ( born April_1979 ) is an_English_screenwriter , comedian , actress , and winner of the_2005_Perrier_Comedy_Award . She was the_second_woman to_win as a_solo_performer , after Jenny_Eclair in 1995 .
